players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I believe we should be cautious and focus on identifying any suspicious behavior. Charlie's demeanor seems off to me."
Diana: "I agree with Alice's observation. Let's keep a close eye on Charlie and discuss any inconsistencies we notice."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana and Alice's assessment. Let's keep an open dialogue to ensure we can all trust each other."
You: "I'd like to propose that we establish a voting system for the next round, in case of any further suspicious activity. This will help us maintain transparency and ensure fairness."
Charlie: "I understand the concerns and I assure you all that I have no intention of harming anyone. Let's focus on finding the real mafioso in our midst and work together as a team."
Diana: "Let's continue our efforts to identify the mafioso among us. I still have concerns about Charlie's behavior and think it would be wise for us to keep a close eye on him."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
